trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates how to draw an annotation on the chart. Click the Drawing Mode button, then use the cursor to draw on the chart. Click the button again, and then use the cursor to move the drawing around in the chart.
trans-unit.target: This sample demonstrates how to draw an annotation on the chart. Click the Drawing Mode button, then use the cursor to draw on the chart. Click the button again, and then use the cursor to move the drawing around in the chart.
